description:
Publisher Star allows you to create professional looking picture notes, flyers, cards, scrapbook pages, design mockups and more on your iPad.  **Now also available for Mac!  (Special Limited Time Promotion @ 50% Off!)

You can publish in a variety of formats including PDF, PNG and JPEG.  Work can easily be saved to iPad's Photo Album, printed with Air Print or shared through Email, Twitter or on the web with Dropbox Sharable Link.

 This App is proudly loved and reviewed by Pop Culture Mom
http://www.popculturemom.com/2012/07/this-week-i-loving-publisher-star-hd.html

Technical Features:
- Font styles (40+ font styles)
- Font size (200 font sizes)
- Font colors (140 gorgeous colors and shades)
- Textbox colors
- Textbox borders (clear, solid or dashed)
- Textbox opacity (full range from opaque to transparent)
- Textbox size (gesture zooming, also come with scroll bars for more precise sizing)
- Textbox shape transformations
- Text alignment
- Touch gesture object resize and rotations
- Canvas background colors (140 colors sorted by palettes)
- Supports fully transparent canvas background (100% clear)
- Adjustable canvas size
- Image borders
- Image size
- Image opacity
- Image reflection and shadow special effects
- Quick clone feature allows batch replications of existing objects
- Preloaded with shape icons (can be resized within the App with gestures)
- Supports multiple layers
- Overlay objects with customizable transparency levels
- Free form object arrangement with support for position locks
- Alignment grids that can be turned on/off
- Snap to grid with adjustable grid size and colors
- Multiple select enabled: style, resize and move multiple objects at once!
- Bundled with professionally designed templates for flyers, invitations, org charts and various other publications
- Supports TextExpander touch snippet expansion 

Share with everyone:
* Email as PDF
* Email as an image (PNG)
* Email as an image (JPG)
* Save to album
* Send to Twitter
* Air Print
* Upload to Dropbox and share with Dropbox Sharable web link

Use it to create:
* graphic notes with images and shapes
* greeting cards
* invitations for parties and gatherings
* newsletters
* flyers
* mockups for websites and user interfaces
* full page contents for magazines and brochures
* advertisements and marketing materials
* graphics and logos
* presentations and demos
* layouts
* many other types of materials that can be captured as an image or PDF

**Mac Edition Now Released on the Mac App Store
Work on your designs using both your iPad and Mac.  Publisher Star now available on the Mac App Store.

To learn more about this App, please visit http://publisherstar.aidaluu.com

Feedback and Ratings: Help us make this App better for you by leaving a rating or review.  Have a question?  Email us at publisherstar@aidaluu.com
